## entity
a formal name for a thing that is being tracked
one theme or topic (just single table)

### associative entity / association entity
intersection table

## domain & cartesian product
- domain: set of possible values for a column
- cartesian product: set of all possible combinations of rows from two tables

table = file = relation
row = record = tuple
column = field = attribute
